data.Name: Current Joys
data.Bio: Nick Rattigan, also known as Current Joys and TELE/VISIONS, is an American singer-songwriter, multi-instrumentalist, vocalist, journalist and music video director, originating from Reno, Nevada. He currently releases music under the moniker Current Joys. He also is the drummer and lead singer of the indie surf rock band Surf Curse. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: girl in red
data.Bio: Girl in Red (stylized in all lowercase) is the indie pop music project of Norwegian singer-songwriter and record producer Marie Ulven Ringheim. She appeared on the scene with her homemade, bedroom pop songs about romance and mental health featured on the early EPs Chapter 1 (2018) and Chapter 2 (2019). Her debut studio album If I Could Make It Go Quiet was released through AWAL on April 30, 2021. Girl in Red has been cited as a queer icon by Paper Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: The Regrettes
data.Bio: The Regrettes is an American pop/rock band from Los Angeles. The band is led by frontwoman Lydia Night, alongside Genessa Gariano on guitar, Drew Thomsen on drums, and bassist Brooke Dickson. The band formed in 2015 and released a few singles before the band released their debut studio album, Feel Your Feelings Fool! on Warner Bros. Records in January 2017. They did multiple tours under which a tour with SWMRS in Europe and the US. The band toured Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Smallpools
data.Bio: Smallpools is an indie pop/alternative band from Los Angeles, CA, United States. Forming in early 2013, the group released their debut single "Dreaming" on RCA Records, May 21, 2013. Thanks to catchy guitar hooks and internet blogs, Smallpools' "Dreaming" is now spreading like wildfire. "Dreaming" skyrocketed to the top of the HypeMachine chart in just hours. Dreaming had hit over 20,000 plays on Soundcloud before the band even hit 500 "likes" on Facebook (Stereofox). Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: The Flaming Lips
data.Bio: The Flaming Lips is an American neo-psychedelic band, formed in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, United States in 1983. Throughout their career, band members have come and gone, but currently The Flaming Lips consist of original members Wayne Coyne (lead vocals, guitar, keyboards) and Michael Ivins (bass, keyboards, backing vocals), along with members Steven Drozd (drums, guitar, keyboards, backing vocals), and Derek Brown (guitar, keyboards, backing vocals). Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Andrew Bird and Iron & Wine and Neko Case
data.Description:
ANDREW BIRD, IRON & WINE, and NEKO CASE at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on June 24, 2020 has been rescheduled to June 22nd 2022.

There is nothing you need to do as your tickets will be valid for the new date.

Unfortunately this show will no longer include a joint set by Calexico and Iron & Wine. Instead, the rescheduled June 2022 date will be a three-band bill of Andrew Bird, Iron & Wine and Neko Case. Tickets already purchased will remain valid, however refunds can be requested due to the date + lineup changes. 


AEG Presents is thrilled to announce ANDREW BIRD, IRON & WINE, and NEKO CASE live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre in 2022

Download the Red Rocks App before your visit. From purchasing and managing your tickets, to park and venue maps, tips, weather alerts and special offers, the official Red Rocks app has everything you need for an unforgettable concert experience.
